mapper.select: select seq,field,duty,writer,title,content,writeDate,viewCount,(select count(*) from industryComments where indSeq=industryStatus.seq) as commentCount from industryStatus order by seq desc
select max(seq) from industryStatus where writer=#{value}
mapper.update: update industryStatus set field=#{field}, duty=#{duty}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
update industryStatus set viewCount=viewCount+1 where seq=#{value}
mapper.select: select * from (select industryStatus.*, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as rown from industryStatus) where rown between #{start} and #{end}

select * from industryStatus
where (writer like '%${search}%') or (title like '%${search}%')
where (writer like '%${search}%')
where (title like '%${search}%')
